intro.title: Deliver your data to the future safely and securely

slider.title: Secure data storage in encrypted secure capsules

cases.title: Use cases
cases.subtitle: Why do you need the SaveToFuture service?

block.title: Handover logins and passwords
block.text: Transferring over to a relatives or trusted persons the logins and passwrods to your accounts, which you wish to share with him/them in case of your death, missing, disability, or other reasons

block.title: Passing on important information to your heirs
block.text: You have a confdential informatio that you want your heirs to recieve in the event of your death, or disadility. You want your heirs to be sent the information itself, or the way how to gain access to such information.

block.title: Protection against threats from third parties, for cases of disability and missing
block.text: Sending a document (s), and / or a photo (s), or a video message to an addressee (s) in case something happened with you. You cannot allow any of these documents/photos/videos be discolured with anyone in the world ahead of time.

block.title: Physical delivery of confidential information
block.text: Applies to either case, however you are not sure if the recipient's email / telegram / whatsapp / etc. will still be available when the timer is activated. Or you don't know the email contacts of the recipients. In these cases, you can select the delivery files extracted from the secure capsule to the addressee via courier service (DHL, FedEx, UPS).

cases.footer: There are many other cases for which the SaveToFuture service is essential

block.txt: Create a secure capsule and put the files you want to close securely in it
Set the capsule storage period and the event by which the capsule will be opened in the future. The storage period can be from 1 month to 50 years
Set the list of destinations to which files are to be sent. Or other ways to manipulate materials
SaveToFuture keeps your files completely encrypted  so that no one can decrypt them
SaveToFuture will track exactly the occurrence of the event you configured
SaveToFuture will extract your files and send them to the addressees in their original form according to your instructions

use.title: Deliver your data to the future safely and securely

price.title: Pricing
price.subtitle: Price for secure capsule is based on total size of files that you want to close in it

reduction.title: Price reduction
reduction.subtitle: Price discount is based on secure capsule storage duration

courier.title: Courier service
courier.subtitle: Delivery of data with express courier service
courier.cost: The cost of data delivery by courier
courier.service: Data delivery is possible by the following services:
courier.servicename: DHL Same Day Jetline, FedEx International Next Flight, UPS Express Critical

calc.title: Calculate the cost of the secure capsule
calc.calcPeriod: Size of your data to be saved in Secure Capsule
calc.delivary: Need data delivery with express courier service

included.title: What is included in the price?
list: Storing your files fully encrypted with the best encryption algorithms
Absence of encryption keys in online
Precise execution of your instructions for delivering files to your addressees
Multi-step backup of encrypted secure capsules
Safe and reliable storages of secure capsules for a period from 1 month to 50 years
Option to prohibit the deletion of data ahead of time
Option to prevent changes to secure capsules settings
No one could decrypt your files from a secure capsule
Optionally delivery of data with premium express courier services

cases.title: Use cases
cases.subtitle: Here are examples of using the Save To Future service in real life

cnt.title: Purpose
cnt.txt: Transferring over to a relatives or trusted persons the logins and passwrods to your accounts, which you wish to share with him/them in case of your death, missing, disability, or other reasons.

cnt.title: Why SaveToFuture?
cnt.txt: You cannot disclosure your passwords to anyone, include law firms and other people. You also should not give passwords to any of your relatives ahead of time. Failing to do so, you are under critical risk of loosing control for your accounts and/or looking contant of these accounts.

items.title: Protection against threats from third parties, for cases of disability and missing
A long term safe for your own data

cnt.txt: Душа моя озарена неземной радостью, как эти чудесные весенние утра, которыми я наслаждаюсь от всего сердца. Я совсем один и блаженствую в здешнем краю, словно созданном для таких, как я. Я так счастлив, мой друг, так упоен ощущением покоя, что искусство мое страдает от этого. Ни одного штриха не мог бы я сделать, а никогда не был таким большим художником, как в эти минуты. Когда от милой моей долины поднимается пар и полдневное солнце стоит над непроницаемой чащей темного леса и лишь редкий луч проскальзывает в его святая святых

Далеко-далеко за словесными горами в стране гласных и согласных живут рыбные тексты. Вдали от всех живут они в буквенных домах на берегу Семантика большого языкового океана. Маленький ручеек Даль журчит по всей стране и обеспечивает ее всеми необходимыми правилами. Эта парадигматическая страна, в которой жаренные члены предложения залетают прямо в рот. Даже всемогущая пунктуация не имеет власти над рыбными текстами, ведущими безорфографичный образ жизни.
